mapper.insert: insert into config (Id, siteName, keywords, pdescription, address, code, telephone, telephoneSale, telephoneService, fax, email, homePage, qq1, qq2, msn1, msn2, addDateTime, updateTime ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telephoneSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephoneService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homePage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msn1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msn2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into config Id, siteName, keywords, pdescription, address, code, telephone, telephoneSale, telephoneService, fax, email, homePage, qq1, qq2, msn1, msn2, addDateTime, updateTime, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdescription ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephoneSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephoneService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homePage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msn1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msn2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update config set siteName = #{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdescription = #{pdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephoneSale = #{telephoneSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephoneService = #{telephoneService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, homePage = #{homePage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq1 = #{qq1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq2 = #{qq2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msn1 = #{msn1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msn2 = #{msn2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addDateTime=#{addDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select , from config order by updateTime desc
mapper.update: update config set num=num+1 where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select , from config order by updateTime desc limit 9;
select , from config order by updateTime desc limit #{curnum,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{pagesize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
